items.title: We Listen
items.description: One conversation. We extract what makes you different.

items.title: We Build
items.description: Ads, content, and proof that converts.

items.title: You Sell
items.description: Your story. Their algorithm. Your customers.

items.name: Luis Herrera
items.quote: We had to relocate. 30 years of local trust, reset to zero. Starting over is daunting. UI.Miami didn't just fix our website; they told our story. Now, Google brings us the right people. We’re not just back in business. We’re being found.

items.name: Yainery Bolaños
items.quote: We wanted to pivot our entire rental fleet. It was terrifying. We were invisible in a crowded market. Ui.miami connected us with the exact customers on Google. We went from scared to booked solid.

items.name: Julio
items.quote: Scaling a SaaS requires precise targeting. A PMax campaign was the way to go. The ROI speaks for itself. We went from $50.000 dolares of monthly loss to a monthly income in autopilot.

pricing.heading: Sell
pricing.packageDescription: Everything you need to be found
pricing.priceLine: "Pay us what you think it was worth this month."
features: Just by texting us (Email, SMS, WhatsApp)
pricing.footnote: Schedule a free discovery call first

difference.bodyTop: They're asking online. Google, ChatGPT, TikTok, etc.
difference.bodyAccent: And the AI doesn't know you yet...
difference.beforeText: Your reputation traveled through handshakes and conversations. That was enough.
difference.afterText: Your reputation travels through algorithms. We teach them your story.

footer.ctaHeadline: You don't get too far to stop now...
footer.ctaSubheading: Join the Next Gen of Cuban businesses in Miami.
footer.description: Making your local reputation discoverable to the modern world. For the next generation of Cuban businesses. Built in Miami.
